token_info.description: Generative Petri dish. Dust? Mold? Coral? Lychen? Salt? â€” Clicking/touching longer makes them grow bigger. On desktop press 'e' or 'r' to reset. I dedicate this little script to Jean-Paul and to my nephew Camille, for they understand the poetry of rocks, worms, pollen and the ocean.
